heading: HR01381
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY AND COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE REPORTED IRREGULARITIES IN THE PUBLIC BIDDING FOR THE "LTO PROCUREMENT OF VEHICLE LICENSE PLATES FOR CY 2017" IN THE AMOUNT OF NINE HUNDRED NINETY EIGHT MILLION EIGHT HUNDRED THOUSAND PESOS (PHP998,800,000.00) AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2017-10-09
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01381
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY AND COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE REPORTED IRREGULARITIES IN THE PUBLIC BIDDING FOR THE "LTO PROCUREMENT OF VEHICLE LICENSE PLATES FOR CY 2017" IN THE AMOUNT OF NINE HUNDRED NINETY EIGHT MILLION EIGHT HUNDRED THOUSAND PESOS (PHP998,800,000.00) AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
